resources.string:
This app was created by Laurens Versluis.
 All data used in this app was provided as open data by the Technical University of Delft.

 Any feedback - suggestions, ideas, improvements, errors - can be sent to improve this app. For more details please refer to the Google Play store.

 If you find this app useful, please recommend it to your fellow students. This app is completely free and designed to grant a quick view of your grades and easy access to private and global information, thus sharing is the best way to show your gratitude and improve development.

 Version 1.3.3
